channel.title: AntiNull
channel.description: Can someone tell me how to add antinull i will give a huge reward for all those who help me i promise u!

item.title: AntiNull
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Bobby, post:2, topic:361819”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=458093.msg3352391#msg3352391 date=1285460030]

Why is Epic Steve not banned yet…

http://tinyurl.com/2bmby4e

or

http://tinyurl.com/2d49vbr

or

http://tinyurl.com/2gyqxkx

I wouldn’t do any of those, just remove Thread-Per-Client and you will be set.
[/quote]

thread per client stops syi attacks not nulls[/quote]

Read Grahams tutorial again.

It stops Syi, nulls, and is a lot better then the regular way of how WL servers handle players connecting.

Read full topic
